column2: Ganges is the embodiment of all sacred waters in Hindu mythology and is personified in the goddess Ganga. As you live fairly close to this great river, your Upadhyaya suggests that you make a visit.
column3: Ganges is the embodiment of all sacred waters in Hindu mythology and is personified in the goddess Ganga. As you live fairly close to this great river, your Upadhyaya suggests that you make a visit.

column2: I will go.
column3: I will go.

column2: I have no time.
column3: I have no time.

column2: You have arrived at the banks of the Ganges. You enter a temple at the banks of the river, avoiding the throng of the common pilgrims. The sacred waters offer a ritual of purification and will strengthen your link to the divine.
column3: You have arrived at the banks of the Ganges. You enter a temple at the banks of the river, avoiding the throng of the common pilgrims. The sacred waters offer a ritual of purification and will strengthen your link to the divine.

column2: I descend into the water and Ganga washes away my sins.

column2: Your court guru doesnt' talk much. He gives strange advice and has also been caught drinking on several occasions. You're beginning to doubt that he's a real guru.
column3: Your court guru doesnt' talk much. He gives strange advice and has also been caught drinking on several occasions. You're beginning to doubt that he's a real guru.

column2: I must investigate this.
column3: I must investigate this.

column2: Who cares?
column3: Who cares?

column2: You've had your court guru watched for several weeks. He secretly drinks and smokes herbs, he keeps sneaking out to pleasure houses in disguise, and spends the money he gets from donations on playing cards.
column3: You've had your court guru watched for several weeks. He secretly drinks and smokes herbs, he keeps sneaking out to pleasure houses in disguise, and spends the money he gets from donations on playing cards.

column2: I must confront him.

column2: Actually, that's my kind of guru.
column3: Actually, that's my kind of guru.

column2: As you confront your court guru over his habits, he breaks down and pleads for mercy: 'I confess, I'm an impostor. Please have mercy on me - I'm just a common man trying to make a living.'
column3: As you confront your court guru over his habits, he breaks down and pleads for mercy: 'I confess, I'm an impostor. Please have mercy on me - I'm just a common man trying to make a living.'

He bows and looks at you in silence.

column2: Priests from a local Hindu temple have approached you, asking for donations. They need to expand the temple with a new building in order to accomodate the growing number of worshipers.
column3: Priests from a local Hindu temple have approached you, asking for donations. They need to expand the temple with a new building in order to accomodate the growing number of worshippers.

column2: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Shiva statue.
column3: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Shiva statue.

column2: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Vishnu statue.
column3: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Vishnu statue.

column2: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Brahma statue.
column3: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Brahma statue.

column2: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Kali statue.
column3: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Kali statue.

column2: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Ganesha statue.
column3: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Ganesha statue.

column2: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Ganga statue.
column3: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Ganga statue.

column2: I will help you with a small donation.
column3: I will help you with a small donation.

column2: I'm sorry, I don't have the funds.
column3: I'm sorry, I don't have the funds.

column2: Monks from a local monastery have approached you, asking for donations. They need to accomodate the rising number of worshipers and still have enough provisions to maintain their other work and studies.
column3: Monks from a local monastery have approached you, asking for donations. They need to accomodate the rising number of worshippers and still have enough provisions to maintain their other work and studies.

column2: Give them gold.
column3: Give them gold.

column2: Give them food.
column3: Give them food.

column2: This is none of my concern.
column3: This is none of my concern.

column2: There have been increasing complaints from merchants in the nearby town lately. It seems a number of naked Jain ascetics have taken to sit and preach in the main square. The merchants say they understand the need to respect other religions, but the naked ascetics are driving away customers and upsetting people's sensitivities.
column3: There have been increasing complaints from merchants in the nearby town lately. It seems a number of naked Jain ascetics have taken to sit and preach in the main square. The merchants say they understand the need to respect other religions, but the naked ascetics are driving away customers and upsetting people's sensitivities.

column2: Why do you bother me with this petty nonsense?
column3: Why do you bother me with this petty nonsense?

column2: We will ask the ascetics to move to a less prominent location.
column3: We will ask the ascetics to move to a less prominent location.

column2: My soldiers will throw these heathens out town!
column3: My soldiers will throw these heathens out town!

column2: The merchants are unhappy
column3: The merchants are unhappy

column2: Jains in your realm are upset.
column3: Jains in your realm are upset.

column2: Gambler
column3: Gambler

column2: Sacrilegious Acts
column3: Sacrilegious Acts

column2: This sacrilege will be widely known.
column3: This sacrilege will be widely known.

column2: A priest from the local temple has arrived, asking speak with you: 'My [Root.GetLordLady], the holy elephants at the temple are all sick. However, we have learned that there is a healer in a neighboring province who is famous for healing ailing elephants. He is, however, most expensive...'
column3: A priest from the local temple has arrived, asking speak with you: 'My [Root.GetLordLady], the holy elephants at the temple are all sick. However, we have learned that there is a healer in a neighboring province who is famous for healing ailing elephants. He is, however, most expensive...'

column2: How unfortunate for you.
column3: How unfortunate for you.

column2: I shall pay for it.
column3: I shall pay for it.

column2: My [Root.GetLordLady], messengers have arrived from the great [From.GetFullName]. It seems [From.GetSheHe] has decided to honor you with the grandest of all gifts, a white elephant!
column3: My [Root.GetLordLady], messengers have arrived from the great [From.GetFullName]. It seems [From.GetSheHe] has decided to honor you with the grandest of all gifts, a white elephant!

column2: I will accept this gracious gift.
column3: I will accept this gracious gift.

column2: I will not accept it.
column3: I will not accept it.

column2: You will need to build a proper stable for your white elephant. It is a unique and holy animal and must have an abode fitting its status.
column3: You will need to build a proper stable for your white elephant. It is a unique and holy animal and must have an abode fitting its status.

column2: I shall build it a house of fine woods and gold.
column3: I shall build it a house of fine woods and gold.

column2: A normal elephant pen will do.
column3: A normal elephant pen will do.

column2: My [Root.GetLordLady], the guards keeping watch over your white elephant report that they have caught some trespassers. It seems they are members of a rather strange local Ganesha cult, and they have been stealing the white elephant's dung for worship.
column3: My [Root.GetLordLady], the guards keeping watch over your white elephant report that they have caught some trespassers. It seems they are members of a rather strange local Ganesha cult, and they have been stealing the white elephant's dung for worship.

column2: Kill the blasphemers!
column3: Kill the blasphemers!

column2: No harm done, give them the droppings as a gift.
column3: No harm done, give them the droppings as a gift.

column2: Let them work in the stables. We will pay them with dung.
column3: Let them work in the stables. We will pay them with dung.

column2: Your white elephant has still not gotten used to its new housing, and it seems restless and bored. Last night it got worse, it started kicking around and going on a rampage, almost tearing the whole place apart.
column3: Your white elephant has still not gotten used to its new housing, and it seems restless and bored. Last night it got worse, it started kicking around and going on a rampage, almost tearing the whole place apart.

column2: Just repair it.
column3: Just repair it.

column2: I've had enough, return this cursed gift.
column3: I've had enough, return this cursed gift.

column2: Sell the damned thing.
column3: Sell the damned thing.

column2: This stupid animal needs to die - now.
column3: This stupid animal needs to die - now.

column2: My [Root.GetLordLady], there is a problem with your white elephant. Yesterday, it broke out from its stable and ran out into to the nearby fields. Once there, it immediately attempted to mate with several elephants - this desire may actually have been the reason for its escape.
column3: My [Root.GetLordLady], there is a problem with your white elephant. Yesterday, it broke out from its stable and ran out into to the nearby fields. Once there, it immediately attempted to mate with several elephants - this desire may actually have been the reason for its escape.

column2: From now on, make sure it gets weekly 'exercise'.
column3: From now on, make sure it gets weekly 'exercise'.

column2: I've had enough, return the lecherous beast.
column3: I've had enough, return the lecherous beast.

column2: Hmm, maybe we could sell it for breeding.
column3: Hmm, maybe we could sell it for breeding.

column2: Kill this elephant. Now.
column3: Kill this elephant. Now.

column2: If you truly wish to kill the White Elephant, you must decide how to proceed, my [Root.GetLordLady]. Whichever method we employ, we should try to make it look like an accident so as to avoid insulting the person who gave it to us.
column3: If you truly wish to kill the White Elephant, you must decide how to proceed, my [Root.GetLordLady]. Whichever method we employ, we should try to make it look like an accident so as to avoid insulting the person who gave it to us.

column2: Poison it.
column3: Poison it.

column2: Let's just starve it to death.
column3: Let's just starve it to death.

column2: Push it over a cliff.
column3: Push it over a cliff.

column2: I don't care who's insulted. Send in the soldiers with lances.
column3: I don't care who's insulted. Send in the soldiers with lances.

column2: The caretakers poison the white elephant's drinking water. The elephant soon starts to wail in pain and becomes quite sick. It is a slow poison, and it takes several days for the beast to expire. Everyone is very concerned and very sad at this sudden 'illness'. No one suspects that you had the elephant poisoned.
column3: The caretakers poison the white elephant's drinking water. The elephant soon starts to wail in pain and becomes quite sick. It is a slow poison, and it takes several days for the beast to expire. Everyone is very concerned and very sad at this sudden 'illness'. No one suspects that you had the elephant poisoned.

column2: Excellent.
column3: Excellent.

column2: The caretakers poison the white elephant's drinking water. The elephant soon starts to wail in pain and becomes quite sick, vomiting blood and dying within minutes. Most people think it very strange that such a healthy animal suddenly died so quickly. Rumor quickly spreads that you had it poisoned.
column3: The caretakers poison the white elephant's drinking water. The elephant soon starts to wail in pain and becomes quite sick, vomiting blood and dying within minutes. Most people think it very strange that such a healthy animal suddenly died so quickly. Rumor quickly spreads that you had it poisoned.

column2: Unfortunate.
column3: Unfortunate.

column2: You instruct the caretakers to stop feeding the elephant. The animal gets progressively weaker and weaker until one morning it is found dead. You have your servants and medics complain loudly about the animal having been sick and refusing to eat. Everyone is sad, but no one suspects foul play.
column3: You instruct the caretakers to stop feeding the elephant. The animal gets progressively weaker and weaker until one morning it is found dead. You have your servants and medics complain loudly about the animal having been sick and refusing to eat. Everyone is sad, but no one suspects foul play.

column2: Excellent.
column3: Excellent.

column2: You instruct the caretakers to stop feeding the elephant. The animal gets progressively weaker and weaker until one morning it is found dead. Word gets out, however, that your servants had stopped delivering food to the stable and soon it is common knowledge that you starved the elephant to death.
column3: You instruct the caretakers to stop feeding the elephant. The animal gets progressively weaker and weaker until one morning it is found dead. Word gets out, however, that your servants had stopped delivering food to the stable and soon it is common knowledge that you starved the elephant to death.

column2: Unfortunate.
column3: Unfortunate.

column2: You arrange to bring the white elephant on an official procession very near some high cliffs. At the right moment, the guards prod the elephant with spears and drive it over the cliff, and it falls to its death. You swiftly have the guards spread the news of the terrible accident. Everyone is shocked, but no one suspects your involvement.
column3: You arrange to bring the white elephant on an official procession very near some high cliffs. At the right moment, the guards prod the elephant with spears and drive it over the cliff, and it falls to its death. You swiftly have the guards spread the news of the terrible accident. Everyone is shocked, but no one suspects your involvement.

column2: Excellent.
column3: Excellent.

column2: You arrange to bring the white elephant on an official procession very near some high cliffs. At the right moment, the guards prod the elephant with spears and drive it over the cliff, and it falls to its death. Unluckily, however, some hunters passing by witnessed the whole incident, and rumor of your bloody deed swiftly spread throughout the realm.
column3: You arrange to bring the white elephant on an official procession very near some high cliffs. At the right moment, the guards prod the elephant with spears and drive it over the cliff, and it falls to its death. Unluckily, however, some hunters passing by witnessed the whole incident, and rumor of your bloody deed swiftly spread throughout the realm.

column2: Unfortunate.
column3: Unfortunate.

column2: You send twenty soldiers armed with lances into the white elephant's stable. They attack and swiftly kill the animal in a few very noisy and bloody moments. Everyone knows it was done on your direct orders, and that's exactly the way you want it to be.
column3: You send twenty soldiers armed with lances into the white elephant's stable. They attack and swiftly kill the animal in a few very noisy and bloody moments. Everyone knows it was done on your direct orders, and that's exactly the way you want it to be.

column2: It had to be done.
column3: It had to be done.

column2: The white elephant seems to be a lot calmer now, and hasn't broken anything or injured anyone in quite a while. It seems that perhaps our troubles with it are over.
column3: The white elephant seems to be a lot calmer now, and hasn't broken anything or injured anyone in quite a while. It seems that perhaps our troubles with it are over.

column2: Let's hope so.
column3: Let's hope so.

column2: A group of wandering Buddhist monks have come to visit the province. They are staging impressive shows of acrobatic unarmed fighting techniques in the villages.
column3: A group of wandering Buddhist monks have come to visit the province. They are staging impressive shows of acrobatic unarmed fighting techniques in the villages.

column2: Those guys are fast as lightning!
column3: Those guys are fast as lightning!

column2: They had better not teach those things to my peasants.
column3: They had better not teach those things to my peasants.

column2: I think I know who it was...
column3: I think I know who it was...

column2: A strange man has approached you, seeking audience with you. He claims he is an 'engineer' and he wishes to build a boat that can travel under water and sail it up the Indus. All he needs is a sponsor for the project. If you help him, he will name the boat after you - 'a you-boat', he jokes, smiling nervously.
column3: A strange man has approached you, seeking audience with you. He claims he is an 'engineer' and he wishes to build a boat that can travel under water and sail it up the Indus. All he needs is a sponsor for the project. If you help him, he will name the boat after you - 'a you-boat', he jokes, smiling nervously.

column2: Interesting. How much money do you need?
column3: Interesting. How much money do you need?

column2: 'You-boat?' Get out. Now.
column3: You-boat?' Get out. Now.

column2: The 'engineer' spent many days building his underwater boat. In the end it was finished and he set out, submerging the craft to the sound of amazed murmuring from the great crowd gathered along the shore. A faint trail of bubbles could be seen as the boat navigated underwater up the river.\nAlas, he was never seen nor heard of again.
column3: The 'engineer' spent many days building his underwater boat. In the end it was finished and he set out, submerging the craft to the sound of amazed murmuring from the great crowd gathered along the shore. A faint trail of bubbles could be seen as the boat navigated underwater up the river.\nAlas, he was never seen nor heard of again.

column2: Hmm, what have we learned from this?
column3: Hmm, what have we learned from this?

column2: It is rumored that a sacred yogi has mastered the art of levitation, and that he can be seen at a marketplace nearby.
column3: It is rumored that a sacred yogi has mastered the art of levitation, and that he can be seen at a marketplace nearby.

column2: I must see this!
column3: I must see this!

column2: I have no time for superstitions.
column3: I have no time for superstitions.

column2: You arrive at the marketplace. There is a large crowd gathered around the yogi. He does indeed seem to be levitating above the ground, eyes closed. Someone mutters that he has been still like that for several hours.
column3: You arrive at the marketplace. There is a large crowd gathered around the yogi. He does indeed seem to be levitating above the ground, eyes closed. Someone mutters that he has been still like that for several hours.

column2: Interesting.
column3: Interesting.

column2: Fascinating! I must donate money to this holy man.
column3: Fascinating! I must donate money to this holy man.

column2: Let's poke him and see what happens.
column3: Let's poke him and see what happens.

column2: I think I'll give him a hard shove.
column3: I think I'll give him a hard shove.

column2: You leave the levitating yogi, pondering the magical mysteries of these holy men.
column3: You leave the levitating yogi, pondering the magical mysteries of these holy men.

column2: The world holds so many fantastic things.
column3: The world holds so many fantastic things.

column2: You poke the yogi. He blinks, then regains his composure.
column3: You poke the yogi. He blinks, then regains his composure.

column2: Poke him again.
column3: Poke him again.

column2: Leave him alone.
column3: Leave him alone.

column2: Give him a good shove.
column3: Give him a good shove.

column2: The yogi opens his eyes, irritated. He steps down and leaves without a word. The rest of the crowd eyes you with disapproval.
column3: The yogi opens his eyes, irritated. He steps down and leaves without a word. The rest of the crowd eyes you with disapproval.

column2: What?
column3: What?

column2: You take step back, then throw yourself forward, giving the yogi a forceful shove. He topples over with a frightened screech, hitting his head on the ground. The crowd stares in stunned silence at you and the yogi.
column3: You take step back, then throw yourself forward, giving the yogi a forceful shove. He topples over with a frightened screech, hitting his head on the ground. The crowd stares in stunned silence at you and the yogi.

column2: I knew he was a fake!
column3: I knew he was a fake!

column2: An elephant has gone crazy and is running amuck in the town outside the castle. It has already killed several people - what shall we do?
column3: An elephant has gone crazy and is running amuck in the town outside the castle. It has already killed several people - what shall we do?

column2: Send soldiers to kill it.
column3: Send soldiers to kill it.

column2: Try to capture it.
column3: Try to capture it.

column2: Several soldiers were severely injured, but they managed to kill the elephant. The animal died screaming, spilling a whole river of blood all over the street. The peasants are very upset.
column3: Several soldiers were severely injured, but they managed to kill the elephant. The animal died screaming, spilling a whole river of blood all over the street. The peasants are very upset.

column2: Well, at least the town is safe now.
column3: Well, at least the town is safe now.

column2: The soldiers managed to lure the elephant to a safe area and then kill it with spears.
column3: The soldiers managed to lure the elephant to a safe area and then kill it with spears.

column2: Ah, good.
column3: Ah, good.

column2: It was impossible to capture the crazed beast. It killed several more people, flattened a couple of buildings and then ran off into the countryside.
column3: It was impossible to capture the crazed beast. It killed several more people, flattened a couple of buildings and then ran off into the countryside.

column2: Unfortunate.
column3: Unfortunate.

column2: A couple of veteran elephant handlers managed to snare and capture the elephant. It has been brought safely to the pens.
column3: A couple of veteran elephant handlers managed to snare and capture the elephant. It has been brought safely to the pens.

column2: Excellent!
column3: Excellent!

column2: It seems that my interest in the Indian religions has come to the attention of one of their practitioners within the realm. We met and have had the most fruitful discussions about theology and other matters.

column2: I have made a friend!
column3: I have made a friend!

column2: You have received a visitor - an emissary from the famous university at Nalanda. He tells of you of the research and other work they do there and offers you a formal invitation to visit and see this marvel of Bihar.
column3: You have received a visitor - an emissary from the famous university at Nalanda. He tells of you of the research and other work they do there and offers you a formal invitation to visit and see this marvel of Bihar.

column2: Interesting - I will accept the invitation.

column2: I don't have the time.

column2: You have arrived at the magnificent University of Nalanda. It's a massive complex of red brick buildings, busy with a bustle of scholars and monks. You have been told that people come here from all over India and beyond in order to study and exchange ideas. The library has a huge amount of texts in every language known to man.\n\nIt's an impresssive place. You don't have much time to spend here, however, so you need to decide what to do...

column2: An Indian ruler who manages to emulate Ashoka the Great and unite all the lands of India under [Root.GetHerHis] rule may claim the title of Samrat Chakravartin, Emperor of Emperors. column2: Some traveling merchants from Europe have arrived, seeking audience. They say they are from Venice and are on a long journey to reach the court of the Khan in in the far east.
column3: Some traveling merchants from Europe have arrived, seeking audience. They say they are from Venice and are on a long journey to reach the court of the Khan in in the far east.

column2: Bring them before me, I shall speak to them.
column3: Bring them before me, I shall speak to them.

column2: These people do not interest me. Send them away.
column3: These people do not interest me. Send them away.

column2: The merchants turn out to be brothers, going by the names of Niccoló Polo and Matteo Polo, and Niccoló's son Marco is also traveling with them. They petition you to provide an escort or guides for travelling east through your realm.
column3: The merchants turn out to be brothers, going by the names of Niccoló Polo and Matteo Polo, and Niccoló's son Marco is also traveling with them. They petition you to provide an escort or guides for travelling east through your realm.

column2: I will provide seasoned guides.
column3: I will provide seasoned guides.

column2: I will provide seasoned guides and an armed escort.
column3: I will provide seasoned guides and an armed escort.

column2: I'm sure they they can manage on their own.
column3: I'm sure they they can manage on their own.

column2: The Polo brothers thank you gratefully for your assistance. The next day they set off eastwards, strengthened by the aid you have provided.
column3: The Polo brothers thank you gratefully for your assistance. The next day they set off eastwards, strengthened by the aid you have provided.

column2: I wish them a good journey.
column3: I wish them a good journey.

column2: The Polo brothers thank you for the audience. After spending the night in town, they set off again the next day.
column3: The Polo brothers thank you for the audience. After spending the night in town, they set off again the next day.

column2: What strange men.
column3: What strange men.

column2: You have received an unexpected visit! The Venetian merchants Niccoló, Matteo and Marco Polo have once again arrived at your court. They explain that they reached the Far East and are now returning after a successful voyage, wanting to stop at your palace to thank you for the valuable aid you offered when they last came by. And they have brought gifts.
column3: You have received an unexpected visit! The Venetian merchants Niccoló, Matteo and Marco Polo have once again arrived at your court. They explain that they reached the Far East and are now returning after a successful voyage, wanting to stop at your palace to thank you for the valuable aid you offered when they last came by. And they have brought gifts.

column2: Come, tell me tales of the East, my friends...
column3: Come, tell me tales of the East, my friends...

column2: [From.GetFirstNameWithNick], your Court Guru, has been very keen to discuss matters of society and tradition with you lately. He expresses his views that the caste system is destructive and inhuman, and that men and women should be treated as equals. He even suggests that you become a champion of change by inviting the poor and the casteless to dine with you at your table.
column3: [From.GetFirstNameWithNick], your Court Guru, has been very keen to discuss matters of society and tradition with you lately. He expresses his views that the caste system is destructive and inhuman, and that men and women should be treated as equals. column2: What nonsense!
column3: What nonsense!

column2: You are too wise for this age, my friend.
column3: You are too wise for this age, my friend.

column2: Guru meditation
column3: Guru meditation

column2:
In order to reach inner peace and become a stronger and more harmonious person, you have been practising meditation with your guru, [From.GetFirstNameWithNick].

You have spent many moments reaching for your inner self, focusing, breathing, finding tranquility and harmony. You contemplate yourself within the universe, the universe within yourself, and your place in time and outside time.

And little by little, you are beginning to feel the difference.
column3:

column2: My [Root.GetLordLady], the province of [From.GetName] is in disarray. There are many reports of deep-set corruption among religious officials of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
column3: My [Root.GetLordLady], the province of [From.GetName] is in disarray. There are many reports of deep-set corruption among religious officials of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.

column2: This is most worrying.
column3: This is most worrying.

column2: Good news, my [Root.GetLordLady]! Thanks to the resurgence of power of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, the corruption in the province of [From.GetName] has been eradicated.
column3: Good news, my [Root.GetLordLady]! Thanks to the resurgence of power of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, the corruption in the province of [From.GetName] has been eradicated.

column2: Excellent!

column3: My [Root.GetLordLady], there are worrying news from the province of [From.GetName]. The [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is weakening and a strange local death cult have taken over several temples.

column2: By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], that is good news!

column2: Bad news indeed!
